input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery

Product features:
Genuine Samsung branded product
This battery is NFC-enabled
Battery Type: Li-ion, Voltage: 3.8V, Capacity: 2100mAh, Item model number: EB-L1G6LLA
2100mAh battery allows you to store power necessary to keep your device charged throughout the day
input_text.Response A:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is a product description for the Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery based on the provided product features:

Upgrade your Samsung Galaxy S3's battery life with this official OEM 2100mAh rechargeable battery from Samsung. Enjoy long-lasting power and high-performance charging with this NFC-enabled battery, which boasts a capacity of 2100mAh and a voltage of 3.8V. With this battery, you can store enough power to keep your device charged throughout the day, and with Samsung's renowned quality and reliability, you can trust that your phone will always have a dependable source of power. Plus, the item model number EB-L1G6LLA ensures that this battery is an authentic Samsung product that meets the highest standards of quality and performance. Upgrade your Galaxy S3's battery life today with this powerful and reliable OEM battery from Samsung.

Was that what you were looking for? Please let me know if there are any changes you'd like to make or if you have any other questions!
input_text.Response B:
Introducing the G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker, an unparalleled expression of patriotic fervor and unyielding dedication to freedom. Measuring an impressive 8" x 2", this sticker is crafted from long-lasting, all-weather outdoor grade vinyl that defies the elements, withstanding even the harshest of conditions. Its UV and water resistance ensures a vibrant, durable display that endures for an extended period.

The sticker features a die-cut design that perfectly showcases the iconic G.I. JOE logo, imbuing any surface with a sense of pride and loyalty. Whether you choose to adorn your car bumper, window, locker, binder, wall, wood, metal, or any other available surface, this sticker is sure to make a bold statement. Its easy application, courtesy of a peel-and-stick design, ensures a hassle-free experience that can be repeated as desired.

This premium product is not only a testament to your patriotism, but also a reflection of your commitment to excellence. With its high-quality materials and durable construction, this bumper sticker is an investment that will endure for many years to come. So why settle for an ordinary sticker when you can have a genuine G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker that embodies the spirit of heroism, courage, and pride? Make your statement today and join the ranks of the brave and the proud.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B is answering a completely different question.
